articles.headline: Week 2 of Satya Sai Centennial Sadhana
articles.content:
This week's spiritual journey continued with three soul-stirring bhajans:
  • Aao Aao Ganapathi Deva
  • Mana Bangaru Parthi Baba
  • Bhaja Mana Sita Ram
The divine vibrations set a perfect atmosphere for our spiritual practice.
articles.author: Editorial Team

articles.headline: 108 Names of Bhagawan: Week 2 Reflection
articles.content:
This week, we delved into the third and fourth names of Bhagawan:
The congregation participated in a focused 5-minute Likhitha Nama Japam, deepening their connection with these divine names.
articles.author: Spiritual Team

articles.headline: Bhajan Antakshari: A Joyful Musical Evening
articles.content: The evening took a delightful turn with an engaging bhajan antakshari session. Devotees, both young and old, participated enthusiastically in this musical game where they had to identify bhajans based on harmonium tunes or mobile recordings. The activity brought together adults and children in a spirit of joy and devotion, creating a beautiful blend of fun and spiritual learning.
articles.author: Youth Team

articles.headline: Evening Conclusion
articles.content: The spiritually enriching evening concluded with the traditional mangala aarti, followed by dinner prasadam. The combination of structured sadhana and joyful activities made this week's session particularly memorable for all participants.
articles.author: Service Team

agenda: Opening Bhajans - Three Selected Divine Songs
108 Names Study - Third and Fourth Names

spiritualHighlight.focus: Third and fourth names of the 108 Names of Bhagawan
